Scrolls

Scrolls are consumable magical items in Remixed Dungeon that produce various effects when read. Each scroll can typically be used only once.

Types of Scrolls

  • Scroll of Identify - Identifies items
  • Scroll of Magic Mapping - Maps the current level
  • Scroll of Recharging - Restores wand charges
  • Scroll of Remove Curse - Removes curses from items
  • Scroll of Teleportation - Teleports you to a random location on the level
  • Scroll of Upgrade - Increases level of equipment
  • Scroll of Challenge - Summons enemies and creates an arena
  • Scroll of Terror - Frightens enemies and makes them flee
  • Scroll of Lullaby - Puts enemies to sleep
  • Scroll of Weapon Upgrade - Specialized weapon upgrade
  • Scroll of Psionic Blast - Damages all visible creatures
  • Scroll of Mirror Image - Creates mirror images of the hero
  • Scroll of Dominion - Charms enemies to follow you
  • Scroll of Summoning - Summons creatures to fight for you
  • Scroll of Curse - Curses a random item in your inventory
  • Blank Scroll - Can be inscribed with an Arcane Stylus

Usage

  • Scrolls are used by reading them
  • Each scroll has a single use and is consumed after use
  • Most scrolls take 1 turn to read
  • Some scrolls target specific equipment or require selection of a target
  • Reading scrolls takes time and may attract nearby enemies
  • Reading scrolls while Blind is impossible

Strategy

  • Identify scrolls early to understand their effects before using
  • Save powerful scrolls for emergency situations
  • Use upgrade scrolls strategically on your best equipment
  • Carry curse removal scrolls when exploring deeper levels
  • Teleportation scrolls can help escape dangerous situations
  • Magic mapping scrolls reveal traps and secret rooms

Obtaining

  • Found as random drops in dungeon levels
  • Available in shops (except Scroll of Psionic Blast and Scroll of Curse)
  • Sometimes found in chests
  • Dropped by certain enemies
  • Scroll Holder container item contains scrolls

Code Reference

  • Base Class: Scroll.java
  • Source Code Location: RemixedDungeon/src/main/java/com/watabou/pixeldungeon/items/scrolls/
